alert.note: Alert for Hunt; Kaufman; Rockwall (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 26 at 8:36AM CDT until April 28 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Cowleech Fork Sabine River At Greenville affecting Hunt County. South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan affecting Rockwall, Kaufman and Hunt Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...South Fork Sabine River Near Quinlan. * WHEN...From late tonight to Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 4.7 feet. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 15.4 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
